alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 12:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong winds and blowing dust will impact portions of Otero, southwestern Kiowa, northeastern Las Animas, Crowley, east central Pueblo and southwestern Bent Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of an area of strong winds from dissipating showers along a line extending from near Boone to 10 miles east of Delhi. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Higbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds and blowing dust may occur with no rain or lightning.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County
